title: Ready, Steady, Transform! – Key takeaways from the forum
content:
Do you remember our event Ready, Steady, Transform!, which took place on 20–21 November in Paris?
We’re excited to look back on it through a new accessible document summarising key insights, sources, and links shared by our speakers and participants during the event.

This first MCA Forum aimed to create a space for exchange, shared learning, and the development of new initiatives. Participants were invited to critically reassess digital cultural practices and share experiences, tools, and visions across key thematic areas: sustainability, inclusion, preservation, digital innovation, and policies.
Centred on two guiding questions — how digital cultural heritage can act as a catalyst for more sustainable and inclusive societies, and how effective cross-sector collabo
creator: violatrombetta
sourceDescription: EUROPEAN TRANS-DOMAIN NETWORK FOR DIGITAL CULTURAL HERITAGE AND RELATED COMMUNITIES
